sentence: Sherwin-Williams Company ( SHW ) will begin trading ex-dividend on May 18, 2016.
A cash dividend payment of $0.84 per share is scheduled to be paid on June 03, 2016.
Shareholders who purchased SHW prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 25.37% increase over the same period a year ago.
At the current stock price of $297.68, the dividend yield is 1.13%.
The previous trading day's last sale of SHW was $297.68, representing a -3.66% decrease from the 52 week high of $309 and a 36.38% increase over the 52 week low of $218.27.
SHW is a part of the Consumer Services sector, which includes companies such as Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) and Lowe's Companies, Inc. ( LOW ).
SHW's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $11.36.
Zacks Investment Research reports SHW's forecasted earnings growth in 2016 as 13.67%, compared to an industry average of 8%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the SHW Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
